page.title: 15MY HOBBY IS HORSERIDING
page.content: I HAVE TWO PONIES CALLED 'CAAN' AND 'PEANUTS' AND I KEEP THEM AT ELMHIRST'S FARM IN MOUNT VERNON ROAD. IN THE WINTER THEY ARE KEPT IN A STABLE AND ARE FED ON HAY AND A PONY MIX OF SUGAR BEET AND BRAN. 'PEANUTS' IS GREY WITH A SHORT MANE, LONG TAIL AND BLUE EYES AND HE IS 1O YEARS OLD.'CAAN' IS ONLY 2. HIS MANE IS LONG AND SO IS HIS TAIL AND HE HAS BLUE EYES. IN THE SUMMER I WALK THEM ROUND BANK END AND WOMBWELL AND ALTHOUGH I PREFER TO SIT ON A SADDLE I HAVE RIDDEN THEM BAREBACK, BUT I FEEL SAFER ON THE SADDLE. I WEAR A HAT, A RIDING JACKET, JODPHURS AND BOOTS. I GROOM THEM REGULARLY AND I HAVE TAKEN 'PEANUTS' TO A GYMKHANA WHERE HE CAME 3RD, AND AT A SHOW HE CAME 2ND AND HAD A CLEAR ROUND.
